ayas.translation: Ta. Sin. Mim.

bismillah.translation: In the name of Allah, Most Gracious, Most Merciful.

ayas.translation: These are verses of the Book that makes (things) clear.

ayas.arabic: لَعَلَّكَ بَـٰخِعٌ نَّفْسَكَ أَلَّا يَكُونُوا۟ مُؤْمِنِينَ
ayas.translation: It may be thou frettest thy soul with grief, that they do not become Believers.
ayas.transliteration: la`allaka bākhi`un nafsaka allā yakūnū mu-minīn

ayas.arabic: إِن نَّشَأْ نُنَزِّلْ عَلَيْهِم مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ ءَايَةً فَظَلَّتْ أَعْنَـٰقُهُمْ لَهَا خَـٰضِعِينَ
ayas.translation: If (such) were Our Will, We could send down to them from the sky a Sign, to which they would bend their necks in humility.
ayas.transliteration: in nasha-nunazzil `alayhim minas samā-i āyatan faẓallat a`nāquhum lahā khāḍi`īn

ayas.arabic: وَمَا يَأْتِيهِم مِّن ذِكْرٍ مِّنَ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ مُحْدَثٍ إِلَّا كَانُوا۟ عَنْهُ مُعْرِضِينَ
ayas.translation: But there comes not to them a newly-revealed Message from (Allah) Most Gracious, but they turn away therefrom.
ayas.transliteration: wa mā ya-tīhim min dhikrin minar raḥmāni muḥdathin illā kānū `anhu mu`riḍīn

ayas.arabic: فَقَدْ كَذَّبُوا۟ فَسَيَأْتِيهِمْ أَنۢبَـٰٓؤُا۟ مَا كَانُوا۟ بِهِۦ يَسْتَهْزِءُونَ
ayas.translation: They have indeed rejected (the Message): so they will know soon (enough) the truth of what they mocked at!
ayas.transliteration: faqad kadhhabū fasaya-tīhim anbā-u mā kānū bihi yastahzi-ūn

ayas.arabic: أَوَلَمْ يَرَوْا۟ إِلَى ٱلْأَرْضِ كَمْ أَنۢبَتْنَا فِيهَا مِن كُلِّ زَوْجٍ كَرِيمٍ
ayas.translation: Do they not look at the earth,- how many noble things of all kinds We have produced therein?
ayas.transliteration: awalam yaraw ilal-arḍi kam anbatnā fīhā min kulli zawjin karīm

ayas.arabic: إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَـَٔايَةً ۖ وَمَا كَانَ أَكْثَرُهُم مُّؤْمِنِينَ
ayas.translation: Verily, in this is a Sign: but most of them do not believe.
ayas.transliteration: inna fī dhālika la-āyah ۖ wa mā kāna aktharuhum mu-minīn

ayas.translation: And verily, thy Lord is He, the Exalted in Might, Most Merciful.

ayas.arabic: وَإِذْ نَادَىٰ رَبُّكَ مُوسَىٰٓ أَنِ ٱئْتِ ٱلْقَوْمَ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ
ayas.translation: Behold, thy Lord called Moses: "Go to the people of iniquity,-
ayas.transliteration: wa idh nādā rabbuka mūsā ani-til qawmaẓ ẓālimīn

ayas.translation: "The people of the Pharaoh: will they not fear Allah?"

ayas.arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ إِنِّىٓ أَخَافُ أَن يُكَذِّبُونِ
ayas.translation: He said: "O my Lord! I do fear that they will charge me with falsehood:
ayas.transliteration: qāla rabbi innī akhāfu an yukadhhibūn

ayas.arabic: وَيَضِيقُ صَدْرِى وَلَا يَنطَلِقُ لِسَانِى فَأَرْسِلْ إِلَىٰ هَـٰرُونَ
ayas.translation: "My breast will be straitened. And my speech may not go (smoothly): so send unto Aaron.
ayas.transliteration: wayaḍīqu ṣadrī walā yanṭaliqu lisānī fa-arsil ilā hārūn

ayas.arabic: وَلَهُمْ عَلَىَّ ذَنۢبٌ فَأَخَافُ أَن يَقْتُلُونِ
ayas.translation: "And (further), they have a charge of crime against me; and I fear they may slay me."

ayas.arabic: قَالَ كَلَّا ۖ فَٱذْهَبَا بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَآ ۖ إِنَّا مَعَكُم مُّسْتَمِعُونَ
ayas.translation: Allah said: "By no means! proceed then, both of you, with Our Signs; We are with you, and will listen (to your call).
ayas.transliteration: qāla kallā ۖ fadh-habā bi-āyātinā ۖ innā ma`akum mustami`ūn

ayas.arabic: فَأْتِيَا فِرْعَوْنَ فَقُولَآ إِنَّا رَسُولُ رَبِّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
ayas.translation: "So go forth, both of you, to Pharaoh, and say: 'We have been sent by the Lord and Cherisher of the worlds;
ayas.transliteration: fa-tiyā fir`awna faqūlā innā rasūlu rabbil `ālamīn

ayas.translation: "'Send thou with us the Children of Israel.'"

ayas.arabic: قَالَ أَلَمْ نُرَبِّكَ فِينَا وَلِيدًا وَلَبِثْتَ فِينَا مِنْ عُمُرِكَ سِنِينَ
ayas.translation: (Pharaoh) said: "Did we not cherish thee as a child among us, and didst thou not stay in our midst many years of thy life?
ayas.transliteration: qāla alam nurabbika fīnā walīdan walabithta fīnā min `umurika sinīn

ayas.arabic: وَفَعَلْتَ فَعْلَتَكَ ٱلَّتِى فَعَلْتَ وَأَنتَ مِنَ ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ
ayas.translation: "And thou didst a deed of thine which (thou knowest) thou didst, and thou art an ungrateful (wretch)!"
ayas.transliteration: wafa`alta fa`latakal latī fa`alta wa-anta minal kāfirīn

ayas.arabic: قَالَ فَعَلْتُهَآ إِذًا وَأَنَا۠ مِنَ ٱلضَّآلِّينَ
ayas.translation: Moses said: "I did it then, when I was in error.
ayas.transliteration: qāla fa`altuhā idhan wa-ana minaḍ ḍāllīn

ayas.arabic: فَفَرَرْتُ مِنكُمْ لَمَّا خِفْتُكُمْ فَوَهَبَ لِى رَبِّى حُكْمًا وَجَعَلَنِى مِنَ ٱلْمُرْسَلِينَ
ayas.translation: "So I fled from you (all) when I feared you; but my Lord has (since) invested me with judgment (and wisdom) and appointed me as one of the messengers.
ayas.transliteration: fafarartu minkum lammā khiftukum fawahaba lī rabbī ḥukman waja`alanī minal mursalīn

ayas.arabic: وَتِلْكَ نِعْمَةٌ تَمُنُّهَا عَلَىَّ أَنْ عَبَّدتَّ بَنِىٓ إِسْرَٰٓءِيلَ
ayas.translation: "And this is the favour with which thou dost reproach me,- that thou hast enslaved the Children of Israel!"
ayas.transliteration: watilka ni`matun tamunnuhā `alayya an `abbadta banī isrā-iyl

ayas.translation: Pharaoh said: "And what is the 'Lord and Cherisher of the worlds'?"

ayas.arabic: قَالَ رَبُّ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَآ ۖ إِن كُنتُم مُّوقِنِينَ
ayas.translation: (Moses) said: "The Lord and Cherisher of the heavens and the earth, and all between,- if ye want to be quite sure."
ayas.transliteration: qāla rabbus samāwāti wal-arḍi wa mā baynahumā ۖ in kuntum mūqinīn

ayas.translation: (Pharaoh) said to those around: "Did ye not listen (to what he says)?"
(Moses) said: "Your Lord and the Lord of your fathers from the beginning!"

ayas.arabic: قَالَ إِنَّ رَسُولَكُمُ ٱلَّذِىٓ أُرْسِلَ إِلَيْكُمْ لَمَجْنُونٌ
ayas.translation: (Pharaoh) said: "Truly your messenger who has been sent to you is a veritable madman!"
ayas.transliteration: qāla inna rasūlakumul ladhī ursila ilaykum lamajnūn

ayas.arabic: قَالَ رَبُّ ٱلْمَشْرِقِ وَٱلْمَغْرِبِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَآ ۖ إِن كُنتُمْ تَعْقِلُونَ
ayas.translation: (Moses) said: "Lord of the East and the West, and all between! if ye only had sense!"
ayas.transliteration: qāla rabbul mashriqi wal maghribi wa mā baynahumā ۖ in kuntum ta`qilūn

ayas.arabic: قَالَ لَئِنِ ٱتَّخَذْتَ إِلَـٰهًا غَيْرِى لَأَجْعَلَنَّكَ مِنَ ٱلْمَسْجُونِينَ
ayas.translation: (Pharaoh) said: "If thou dost put forward any god other than me, I will certainly put thee in prison!"
ayas.transliteration: qāla la-init-takhadhta ilāhan ghayrī la-aj`alannaka minal masjūnīn

ayas.translation: (Moses) said: "Even if I showed you something clear (and) convincing?"

ayas.arabic: قَالَ فَأْتِ بِهِۦٓ إِن كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلصَّـٰدِقِينَ
ayas.translation: (Pharaoh) said: "Show it then, if thou tellest the truth!"
ayas.transliteration: qāla fa-ti bihi in kunta minaṣ ṣādiqīn

ayas.arabic: فَأَلْقَىٰ عَصَاهُ فَإِذَا هِىَ ثُعْبَانٌ مُّبِينٌ
ayas.translation: So (Moses) threw his rod, and behold, it was a serpent, plain (for all to see)!

ayas.arabic: وَنَزَعَ يَدَهُۥ فَإِذَا هِىَ بَيْضَآءُ لِلنَّـٰظِرِينَ
ayas.translation: And he drew out his hand, and behold, it was white to all beholders!
ayas.transliteration: wanaza`a yadahu fa-idhā hiya bayḍā-u linnāẓirīn

ayas.arabic: قَالَ لِلْمَلَإِ حَوْلَهُۥٓ إِنَّ هَـٰذَا لَسَـٰحِرٌ عَلِيمٌ
ayas.translation: (Pharaoh) said to the Chiefs around him: "This is indeed a sorcerer well-versed:
ayas.transliteration: qāla lil-mala-i ḥawlahu inna hādhā lasāḥirun `alīm

ayas.arabic: يُرِيدُ أَن يُخْرِجَكُم مِّنْ أَرْضِكُم بِسِحْرِهِۦ فَمَاذَا تَأْمُرُونَ
ayas.translation: "His plan is to get you out of your land by his sorcery; then what is it ye counsel?"
ayas.transliteration: yurīdu an yukhrijakum min arḍikum bisiḥrihi famādhā ta-murūn

ayas.arabic: قَالُوٓا۟ أَرْجِهْ وَأَخَاهُ وَٱبْعَثْ فِى ٱلْمَدَآئِنِ حَـٰشِرِينَ
ayas.translation: They said: "Keep him and his brother in suspense (for a while), and dispatch to the Cities heralds to collect-
ayas.transliteration: qālū arjih wa-akhāhu wab`ath fil madā-ini ḥāshirīn

ayas.translation: "And bring up to thee all (our) sorcerers well-versed."
So the sorcerers were got together for the appointment of a day well-known,
And the people were told: "Are ye (now) assembled?-

ayas.arabic: لَعَلَّنَا نَتَّبِعُ ٱلسَّحَرَةَ إِن كَانُوا۟ هُمُ ٱلْغَـٰلِبِينَ
ayas.translation: "That we may follow the sorcerers (in religion) if they win?"
ayas.transliteration: la`allanā nattabi`us saḥarata in kānū humul ghālibīn

ayas.arabic: فَلَمَّا جَآءَ ٱلسَّحَرَةُ قَالُوا۟ لِفِرْعَوْنَ أَئِنَّ لَنَا لَأَجْرًا إِن كُنَّا نَحْنُ ٱلْغَـٰلِبِينَ
ayas.translation: So when the sorcerers arrived, they said to Pharaoh: "Of course - shall we have a (suitable) reward if we win?
ayas.transliteration: falammā jā-as saḥaratu qālū lifir`awna a-inna lanā la-ajran in kunnā naḥnul ghālibīn

ayas.arabic: قَالَ نَعَمْ وَإِنَّكُمْ إِذًا لَّمِنَ ٱلْمُقَرَّبِينَ
ayas.translation: He said: "Yea, (and more),- for ye shall in that case be (raised to posts) nearest (to my person)."
ayas.transliteration: qāla na`am wa innakum idhal laminal muqarrabīn

ayas.arabic: قَالَ لَهُم مُّوسَىٰٓ أَلْقُوا۟ مَآ أَنتُم مُّلْقُونَ
ayas.translation: Moses said to them: "Throw ye - that which ye are about to throw!"
ayas.transliteration: qāla lahum mūsā alqū mā antum mulqūn

ayas.arabic: فَأَلْقَوْا۟ حِبَالَهُمْ وَعِصِيَّهُمْ وَقَالُوا۟ بِعِزَّةِ فِرْعَوْنَ إِنَّا لَنَحْنُ ٱلْغَـٰلِبُونَ
ayas.translation: So they threw their ropes and their rods, and said: "By the might of Pharaoh, it is we who will certainly win!"
ayas.transliteration: fa-alqaw ḥibālahum wa`iṣiyyahum waqālū bi`izzati fir`awna innā lanaḥnul ghālibūn

ayas.arabic: فَأَلْقَىٰ مُوسَىٰ عَصَاهُ فَإِذَا هِىَ تَلْقَفُ مَا يَأْفِكُونَ
ayas.translation: Then Moses threw his rod, when, behold, it straightway swallows up all the falsehoods which they fake!
ayas.transliteration: fa-alqā mūsā `aṣāhu fa-idhā hiya talqafu mā ya-fikūn

ayas.translation: Then did the sorcerers fall down, prostrate in adoration,
Saying: "We believe in the Lord of the Worlds,
"The Lord of Moses and Aaron."

ayas.arabic: قَالَ ءَامَنتُمْ لَهُۥ قَبْلَ أَنْ ءَاذَنَ لَكُمْ ۖ إِنَّهُۥ لَكَبِيرُكُمُ ٱلَّذِى عَلَّمَكُمُ ٱلسِّحْرَ فَلَسَوْفَ تَعْلَمُونَ ۚ لَأُقَطِّعَنَّ أَيْدِيَكُمْ وَأَرْجُلَكُم مِّنْ خِلَـٰفٍ وَلَأُصَلِّبَنَّكُمْ أَجْمَعِينَ
ayas.translation: Said (Pharaoh): "Believe ye in Him before I give you permission? surely he is your leader, who has taught you sorcery! but soon shall ye know! Be sure I will cut off your hands and your feet on opposite sides, and I will cause you all to die on the cross!"
ayas.transliteration: qāla āmantum lahu qabla an ādhana lakum ۖ innahu lakabīrukumul ladhī `allamakumus siḥra falasawfa ta`lamūn ۚ la-uqaṭṭi`anna aydiyakum wa-arjulakum min khilāfin wala-uṣallibannakum ajma`īn

ayas.arabic: قَالُوا۟ لَا ضَيْرَ ۖ إِنَّآ إِلَىٰ رَبِّنَا مُنقَلِبُونَ
ayas.translation: They said: "No matter! for us, we shall but return to our Lord!
ayas.transliteration: qālū lā ḍayr ۖ innā ilā rabbinā munqalibūn

ayas.arabic: إِنَّا نَطْمَعُ أَن يَغْفِرَ لَنَا رَبُّنَا خَطَـٰيَـٰنَآ أَن كُنَّآ أَوَّلَ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
ayas.translation: "Only, our desire is that our Lord will forgive us our faults, that we may become foremost among the believers!"
ayas.transliteration: innā naṭma`u an yaghfira lanā rabbunā khaṭāyānā an kunnā awwalal-mu-minīn

ayas.arabic: وَأَوْحَيْنَآ إِلَىٰ مُوسَىٰٓ أَنْ أَسْرِ بِعِبَادِىٓ إِنَّكُم مُّتَّبَعُونَ
ayas.translation: By inspiration we told Moses: "Travel by night with my servants; for surely ye shall be pursued."
ayas.transliteration: wa-awḥaynā ilā mūsā an asri bi`ibādī innakum muttaba`ūn

ayas.translation: Then Pharaoh sent heralds to (all) the Cities,
(Saying): "These (Israelites) are but a small band,
"And they are raging furiously against us;
"But we are a multitude amply fore-warned."
So We expelled them from gardens, springs,
Treasures, and every kind of honourable position;
Thus it was, but We made the Children of Israel inheritors of such things.
So they pursued them at sunrise.

ayas.arabic: فَلَمَّا تَرَٰٓءَا ٱلْجَمْعَانِ قَالَ أَصْحَـٰبُ مُوسَىٰٓ إِنَّا لَمُدْرَكُونَ
ayas.translation: And when the two bodies saw each other, the people of Moses said: "We are sure to be overtaken."
ayas.transliteration: falammā tarā al jam`āni qāla aṣ-ḥābu mūsā innā lamudrakūn

ayas.arabic: قَالَ كَلَّآ ۖ إِنَّ مَعِىَ رَبِّى سَيَهْدِينِ
ayas.translation: (Moses) said: "By no means! my Lord is with me! Soon will He guide me!"
ayas.transliteration: qāla kallā ۖ inna ma`iya rabbī sayahdīn

ayas.arabic: فَأَوْحَيْنَآ إِلَىٰ مُوسَىٰٓ أَنِ ٱضْرِب بِّعَصَاكَ ٱلْبَحْرَ ۖ فَٱنفَلَقَ فَكَانَ كُلُّ فِرْقٍ كَٱلطَّوْدِ ٱلْعَظِيمِ
ayas.translation: Then We told Moses by inspiration: "Strike the sea with thy rod." So it divided, and each separate part became like the huge, firm mass of a mountain.
ayas.transliteration: fa-awḥaynā ilā mūsā aniḍ-rib bi`aṣākal baḥr ۖ fanfalaqa fakāna kullu firqin kaṭ ṭawdil `aẓīm

ayas.translation: And We made the other party approach thither.
We delivered Moses and all who were with him;
ayas.transliteration: wa-anjaynā mūsā wa man ma`ahu ajma`īn

ayas.translation: But We drowned the others.

ayas.arabic: إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَـَٔايَةً ۖ وَمَا كَانَ أَكْثَرُهُم مُّؤْمِنِينَ
ayas.translation: Verily in this is a Sign: but most of them do not believe.
ayas.transliteration: inna fī dhālika la-āyah ۖ wa mā kāna aktharuhum mu-minīn

ayas.translation: And verily thy Lord is He, the Exalted in Might, Most Merciful.
And rehearse to them (something of) Abraham's story.

ayas.arabic: إِذْ قَالَ لِأَبِيهِ وَقَوْمِهِۦ مَا تَعْبُدُونَ
ayas.translation: Behold, he said to his father and his people: "What worship ye?"
ayas.transliteration: idh qāla li-abīhi waqawmihi mā ta`budūn

ayas.arabic: قَالُوا۟ نَعْبُدُ أَصْنَامًا فَنَظَلُّ لَهَا عَـٰكِفِينَ
ayas.translation: They said: "We worship idols, and we remain constantly in attendance on them."
He said: "Do they listen to you when ye call (on them)?"
"Or do you good or harm?"

ayas.arabic: قَالُوا۟ بَلْ وَجَدْنَآ ءَابَآءَنَا كَذَٰلِكَ يَفْعَلُونَ
ayas.translation: They said: "Nay, but we found our fathers doing thus (what we do)."
ayas.transliteration: qālū bal wajadnā ābā-anā kadhālika yaf`alūn

ayas.translation: He said: "Do ye then see whom ye have been worshipping,-
ayas.transliteration: qāla afara aytum mā kuntum ta`budūn

ayas.translation: "Ye and your fathers before you?-

ayas.arabic: فَإِنَّهُمْ عَدُوٌّ لِّىٓ إِلَّا رَبَّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
ayas.translation: "For they are enemies to me; not so the Lord and Cherisher of the Worlds;
"Who created me, and it is He Who guides me;
"Who gives me food and drink,
"And when I am ill, it is He Who cures me;
"Who will cause me to die, and then to life (again);

ayas.arabic: وَٱلَّذِىٓ أَطْمَعُ أَن يَغْفِرَ لِى خَطِيٓـَٔتِى يَوْمَ ٱلدِّينِ
ayas.translation: "And who, I hope, will forgive me my faults on the day of Judgment.
ayas.transliteration: wal ladhī aṭma`u an yaghfira lī khaṭī-atī yawmad dīn

ayas.arabic: رَبِّ هَبْ لِى حُكْمًا وَأَلْحِقْنِى بِٱلصَّـٰلِحِينَ
ayas.translation: "O my Lord! bestow wisdom on me, and join me with the righteous;
ayas.transliteration: rabbi hab lī ḥukman wa-alḥiqnī biṣ ṣāliḥīn

ayas.arabic: وَٱجْعَل لِّى لِسَانَ صِدْقٍ فِى ٱلْـَٔاخِرِينَ
ayas.translation: "Grant me honourable mention on the tongue of truth among the latest (generations);
"Make me one of the inheritors of the Garden of Bliss;

ayas.arabic: وَٱغْفِرْ لِأَبِىٓ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ مِنَ ٱلضَّآلِّينَ
ayas.translation: "Forgive my father, for that he is among those astray;
ayas.transliteration: waghfir li-abī innahu kāna minaḍ ḍāllīn

ayas.translation: "And let me not be in disgrace on the Day when (men) will be raised up;-

ayas.arabic: يَوْمَ لَا يَنفَعُ مَالٌ وَلَا بَنُونَ
ayas.translation: "The Day whereon neither wealth nor sons will avail,
ayas.transliteration: yawma lā yanfa`u mālun walā banūn

ayas.arabic: إِلَّا مَنْ أَتَى ٱللَّهَ بِقَلْبٍ سَلِيمٍ
ayas.translation: "But only he (will prosper) that brings to Allah a sound heart;
"To the righteous, the Garden will be brought near,
"And to those straying in Evil, the Fire will be placed in full view;

ayas.arabic: وَقِيلَ لَهُمْ أَيْنَ مَا كُنتُمْ تَعْبُدُونَ
ayas.translation: "And it shall be said to them: 'Where are the (gods) ye worshipped-
ayas.transliteration: waqīla lahum ayna mā kuntum ta`budūn

ayas.arabic: مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ هَلْ يَنصُرُونَكُمْ أَوْ يَنتَصِرُونَ
ayas.translation: "'Besides Allah? Can they help you or help themselves?'
ayas.transliteration: min dūnillāhi hal yanṣurūnakum aw yantaṣirūn

ayas.translation: "Then they will be thrown headlong into the (Fire),- they and those straying in Evil,
"And the whole hosts of Iblis together.
"They will say there in their mutual bickerings:

ayas.arabic: تَٱللَّهِ إِن كُنَّا لَفِى ضَلَـٰلٍ مُّبِينٍ
ayas.translation: "'By Allah, we were truly in an error manifest,
ayas.transliteration: tallāhi in kunnā lafī ḍalālin mubīn

ayas.translation: "'When we held you as equals with the Lord of the Worlds;
"'And our seducers were only those who were steeped in guilt.
"'Now, then, we have none to intercede (for us),
"'Nor a single friend to feel (for us).

ayas.arabic: فَلَوْ أَنَّ لَنَا كَرَّةً فَنَكُونَ مِنَ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
ayas.translation: "'Now if we only had a chance of return we shall truly be of those who believe!'"
ayas.transliteration: falaw anna lanā karratan fanakūna minal mu-minīn

ayas.arabic: إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَـَٔايَةً ۖ وَمَا كَانَ أَكْثَرُهُم مُّؤْمِنِينَ
ayas.translation: Verily in this is a Sign but most of them do not believe.
ayas.transliteration: inna fī dhālika la-āyah ۖ wa mā kāna aktharuhum mu-minīn

ayas.translation: And verily thy Lord is He, the Exalted in Might, Most Merciful.
The people of Noah rejected the messengers.

ayas.arabic: إِذْ قَالَ لَهُمْ أَخُوهُمْ نُوحٌ أَلَا تَتَّقُونَ
ayas.translation: Behold, their brother Noah said to them: "Will ye not fear (Allah)?
ayas.transliteration: idh qāla lahum akhūhum nūḥun alā tattaqūn

ayas.translation: "I am to you a messenger worthy of all trust:
"So fear Allah, and obey me.

ayas.arabic: وَمَآ أَسْـَٔلُكُمْ عَلَيْهِ مِنْ أَجْرٍ ۖ إِنْ أَجْرِىَ إِلَّا عَلَىٰ رَبِّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
ayas.translation: "No reward do I ask of you for it: my reward is only from the Lord of the Worlds:
ayas.transliteration: wa mā as-alukum `alayhi min ajr ۖ in ajriya illā `alā rabbil `ālamīn

ayas.translation: "So fear Allah, and obey me."
They said: "Shall we believe in thee when it is the meanest that follow thee?"

ayas.arabic: قَالَ وَمَا عِلْمِى بِمَا كَانُوا۟ يَعْمَلُونَ
ayas.translation: He said: "And what do I know as to what they do?
ayas.transliteration: qāla wa mā `il-mī bimā kānū ya`malūn

ayas.arabic: إِنْ حِسَابُهُمْ إِلَّا عَلَىٰ رَبِّى ۖ لَوْ تَشْعُرُونَ
ayas.translation: "Their account is only with my Lord, if ye could (but) understand.
ayas.transliteration: in ḥisābuhum illā `alā rabbī ۖ law tash`urūn

ayas.translation: "I am not one to drive away those who believe.
"I am sent only to warn plainly in public."

ayas.arabic: قَالُوا۟ لَئِن لَّمْ تَنتَهِ يَـٰنُوحُ لَتَكُونَنَّ مِنَ ٱلْمَرْجُومِينَ
ayas.translation: They said: "If thou desist not, O Noah! thou shalt be stoned (to death)."
ayas.transliteration: qālū la-in lam tantahi yānūḥu latakūnanna minal marjūmīn

ayas.translation: He said: "O my Lord! truly my people have rejected me.

ayas.arabic: فَٱفْتَحْ بَيْنِى وَبَيْنَهُمْ فَتْحًا وَنَجِّنِى وَمَن مَّعِىَ مِنَ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
ayas.translation: "Judge Thou, then, between me and them openly, and deliver me and those of the Believers who are with me."
ayas.transliteration: faftaḥ baynī wabaynahum fat-ḥan wanajjinī wa man ma`iya minal mu-minīn

ayas.arabic: فَأَنجَيْنَـٰهُ وَمَن مَّعَهُۥ فِى ٱلْفُلْكِ ٱلْمَشْحُونِ
ayas.translation: So We delivered him and those with him, in the Ark filled (with all creatures).
ayas.transliteration: fa-anjaynāhu wa man ma`ahu fil fulkil mashḥūn

ayas.translation: Thereafter We drowned those who remained behind.

ayas.arabic: إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَـَٔايَةً ۖ وَمَا كَانَ أَكْثَرُهُم مُّؤْمِنِينَ
ayas.translation: Verily in this is a Sign: but most of them do not believe.
ayas.transliteration: inna fī dhālika la-āyah ۖ wa mā kāna aktharuhum mu-minīn

ayas.translation: And verily thy Lord is He, the Exalted in Might, Most Merciful.
The 'Ad (people) rejected the messengers.

ayas.arabic: إِذْ قَالَ لَهُمْ أَخُوهُمْ هُودٌ أَلَا تَتَّقُونَ
ayas.translation: Behold, their brother Hud said to them: "Will ye not fear (Allah)?
ayas.transliteration: idh qāla lahum akhūhum hūdun alā tattaqūn

ayas.translation: "I am to you a messenger worthy of all trust:
"So fear Allah and obey me.

ayas.arabic: وَمَآ أَسْـَٔلُكُمْ عَلَيْهِ مِنْ أَجْرٍ ۖ إِنْ أَجْرِىَ إِلَّا عَلَىٰ رَبِّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
ayas.translation: "No reward do I ask of you for it: my reward is only from the Lord of the Worlds.
ayas.transliteration: wa mā as-alukum `alayhi min ajr ۖ in ajriya illā `alā rabbil `ālamīn

ayas.translation: "Do ye build a landmark on every high place to amuse yourselves?
"And do ye get for yourselves fine buildings in the hope of living therein (for ever)?
"And when ye exert your strong hand, do ye do it like men of absolute power?
"Now fear Allah, and obey me.
"Yea, fear Him Who has bestowed on you freely all that ye know.
"Freely has He bestowed on you cattle and sons,-
"And Gardens and Springs.

ayas.arabic: إِنِّىٓ أَخَافُ عَلَيْكُمْ عَذَابَ يَوْمٍ عَظِيمٍ
ayas.translation: "Truly I fear for you the Penalty of a Great Day."

ayas.arabic: قَالُوا۟ سَوَآءٌ عَلَيْنَآ أَوَعَظْتَ أَمْ لَمْ تَكُن مِّنَ ٱلْوَٰعِظِينَ
ayas.translation: They said: "It is the same to us whether thou admonish us or be not among (our) admonishers!
ayas.transliteration: qālū sawā-un `alaynā awa`aẓta am lam takun minal wā`iẓīn

ayas.translation: "This is no other than a customary device of the ancients,
"And we are not the ones to receive Pains and Penalties!"

ayas.arabic: فَكَذَّبُوهُ فَأَهْلَكْنَـٰهُمْ ۗ إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَـَٔايَةً ۖ وَمَا كَانَ أَكْثَرُهُم مُّؤْمِنِينَ
ayas.translation: So they rejected him, and We destroyed them. Verily in this is a Sign: but most of them do not believe.
ayas.transliteration: fakadhhabūhu fa-ahlaknāhum ۗ inna fī dhālika la-āyah ۖ wa mā kāna aktharuhum mu-minīn

ayas.translation: And verily thy Lord is He, the Exalted in Might, Most Merciful.
The Thamud (people) rejected the messengers.

ayas.arabic: إِذْ قَالَ لَهُمْ أَخُوهُمْ صَـٰلِحٌ أَلَا تَتَّقُونَ
ayas.translation: Behold, their brother Salih said to them: "Will you not fear (Allah)?
ayas.transliteration: idh qāla lahum akhūhum ṣāliḥun alā tattaqūn

ayas.translation: "I am to you a messenger worthy of all trust.
"So fear Allah, and obey me.

ayas.arabic: وَمَآ أَسْـَٔلُكُمْ عَلَيْهِ مِنْ أَجْرٍ ۖ إِنْ أَجْرِىَ إِلَّا عَلَىٰ رَبِّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
ayas.translation: "No reward do I ask of you for it: my reward is only from the Lord of the Worlds.
ayas.transliteration: wa mā as-alukum `alayhi min ajr ۖ in ajriya illā `alā rabbil `ālamīn

ayas.translation: "Will ye be left secure, in (the enjoyment of) all that ye have here?-
"Gardens and Springs,
"And corn-fields and date-palms with spathes near breaking (with the weight of fruit)?
"And ye carve houses out of (rocky) mountains with great skill.
"But fear Allah and obey me;
"And follow not the bidding of those who are extravagant,-

ayas.arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ يُفْسِدُونَ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ وَلَا يُصْلِحُونَ
ayas.translation: "Who make mischief in the land, and mend not (their ways)."
They said: "Thou art only one of those bewitched!

ayas.arabic: مَآ أَنتَ إِلَّا بَشَرٌ مِّثْلُنَا فَأْتِ بِـَٔايَةٍ إِن كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلصَّـٰدِقِينَ
ayas.translation: "Thou art no more than a mortal like us: then bring us a Sign, if thou tellest the truth!"
ayas.transliteration: mā anta illā basharun mithlunā fa-ti bi-āyatin in kunta minaṣ ṣādiqīn

ayas.arabic: قَالَ هَـٰذِهِۦ نَاقَةٌ لَّهَا شِرْبٌ وَلَكُمْ شِرْبُ يَوْمٍ مَّعْلُومٍ
ayas.translation: He said: "Here is a she-camel: she has a right of watering, and ye have a right of watering, (severally) on a day appointed.
ayas.transliteration: qāla hādhihi nāqatun lahā shirbun walakum shirbu yawmin ma`lūm

ayas.arabic: وَلَا تَمَسُّوهَا بِسُوٓءٍ فَيَأْخُذَكُمْ عَذَابُ يَوْمٍ عَظِيمٍ
ayas.translation: "Touch her not with harm, lest the Penalty of a Great Day seize you."
But they ham-strung her: then did they become full of regrets.

ayas.arabic: فَأَخَذَهُمُ ٱلْعَذَابُ ۗ إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَـَٔايَةً ۖ وَمَا كَانَ أَكْثَرُهُم مُّؤْمِنِينَ
ayas.translation: But the Penalty seized them. Verily in this is a Sign: but most of them do not believe.
ayas.transliteration: fa-akhadhahumul `adhāb ۗ inna fī dhālika la-āyah ۖ wa mā kāna aktharuhum mu-minīn

ayas.translation: And verily thy Lord is He, the Exalted in Might, Most Merciful.
The people of Lut rejected the messengers.

ayas.arabic: إِذْ قَالَ لَهُمْ أَخُوهُمْ لُوطٌ أَلَا تَتَّقُونَ
ayas.translation: Behold, their brother Lut said to them: "Will ye not fear (Allah)?
ayas.transliteration: idh qāla lahum akhūhum lūṭun alā tattaqūn

ayas.translation: "I am to you a messenger worthy of all trust.
"So fear Allah and obey me.

ayas.arabic: وَمَآ أَسْـَٔلُكُمْ عَلَيْهِ مِنْ أَجْرٍ ۖ إِنْ أَجْرِىَ إِلَّا عَلَىٰ رَبِّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
ayas.translation: "No reward do I ask of you for it: my reward is only from the lord of the Worlds.
ayas.transliteration: wa mā as-alukum `alayhi min ajr ۖ in ajriya illā `alā rabbil `ālamīn

ayas.translation: "Of all the creatures in the world, will ye approach males,

ayas.arabic: وَتَذَرُونَ مَا خَلَقَ لَكُمْ رَبُّكُم مِّنْ أَزْوَٰجِكُم ۚ بَلْ أَنتُمْ قَوْمٌ عَادُونَ
ayas.translation: "And leave those whom Allah has created for you to be your mates? Nay, ye are a people transgressing (all limits)!"
ayas.transliteration: watadharūna mā khalaqa lakum rabbukum min azwājikum ۚ bal antum qawmun `ādūn

ayas.arabic: قَالُوا۟ لَئِن لَّمْ تَنتَهِ يَـٰلُوطُ لَتَكُونَنَّ مِنَ ٱلْمُخْرَجِينَ
ayas.translation: They said: "If thou desist not, O Lut! thou wilt assuredly be cast out!"
ayas.transliteration: qālū la-in lam tantahi yālūṭu latakūnanna minal mukhrajīn

ayas.translation: He said: "I do detest your doings."
"O my Lord! deliver me and my family from such things as they do!"
So We delivered him and his family,- all
Except an old woman who lingered behind.
But the rest We destroyed utterly.

ayas.arabic: وَأَمْطَرْنَا عَلَيْهِم مَّطَرًا ۖ فَسَآءَ مَطَرُ ٱلْمُنذَرِينَ
ayas.translation: We rained down on them a shower (of brimstone): and evil was the shower on those who were admonished (but heeded not)!

ayas.arabic: إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَـَٔايَةً ۖ وَمَا كَانَ أَكْثَرُهُم مُّؤْمِنِينَ
ayas.translation: Verily in this is a Sign: but most of them do not believe.
ayas.transliteration: inna fī dhālika la-āyah ۖ wa mā kāna aktharuhum mu-minīn

ayas.translation: And verily thy Lord is He, the Exalted in Might Most Merciful.
The Companions of the Wood rejected the messengers.

ayas.arabic: إِذْ قَالَ لَهُمْ شُعَيْبٌ أَلَا تَتَّقُونَ
ayas.translation: Behold, Shu'aib said to them: "Will ye not fear (Allah)?
ayas.transliteration: idh qāla lahum shu`aybun alā tattaqūn

ayas.translation: "I am to you a messenger worthy of all trust.
"So fear Allah and obey me.

ayas.arabic: وَمَآ أَسْـَٔلُكُمْ عَلَيْهِ مِنْ أَجْرٍ ۖ إِنْ أَجْرِىَ إِلَّا عَلَىٰ رَبِّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
ayas.translation: "No reward do I ask of you for it: my reward is only from the Lord of the Worlds.
ayas.transliteration: wa mā as-alukum `alayhi min ajr ۖ in ajriya illā `alā rabbil `ālamīn

ayas.arabic: أَوْفُوا۟ ٱلْكَيْلَ وَلَا تَكُونُوا۟ مِنَ ٱلْمُخْسِرِينَ
ayas.translation: "Give just measure, and cause no loss (to others by fraud).
ayas.transliteration: awful kayla walā takūnū minal mukhsirīn

ayas.translation: "And weigh with scales true and upright.

ayas.arabic: وَلَا تَبْخَسُوا۟ ٱلنَّاسَ أَشْيَآءَهُمْ وَلَا تَعْثَوْا۟ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ مُفْسِدِينَ
ayas.translation: "And withhold not things justly due to men, nor do evil in the land, working mischief.
ayas.transliteration: walā tabkhasun nāsa ashyā-ahum walā ta`thaw fil-arḍi mufsidīn

ayas.translation: "And fear Him Who created you and (who created) the generations before (you)"
They said: "Thou art only one of those bewitched!

ayas.arabic: وَمَآ أَنتَ إِلَّا بَشَرٌ مِّثْلُنَا وَإِن نَّظُنُّكَ لَمِنَ ٱلْكَـٰذِبِينَ
ayas.translation: "Thou art no more than a mortal like us, and indeed we think thou art a liar!
ayas.transliteration: wa mā anta illā basharun mithlunā wa in naẓunnuka laminal kādhibīn

ayas.arabic: فَأَسْقِطْ عَلَيْنَا كِسَفًا مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ إِن كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلصَّـٰدِقِينَ
ayas.translation: "Now cause a piece of the sky to fall on us, if thou art truthful!"
ayas.transliteration: fa-asqiṭ `alaynā kisafan minas samā-i in kunta minaṣ ṣādiqīn

ayas.translation: He said: "My Lord knows best what ye do."

ayas.arabic: فَكَذَّبُوهُ فَأَخَذَهُمْ عَذَابُ يَوْمِ ٱلظُّلَّةِ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ عَذَابَ يَوْمٍ عَظِيمٍ
ayas.translation: But they rejected him. Then the punishment of a day of overshadowing gloom seized them, and that was the Penalty of a Great Day.
ayas.transliteration: fakadhhabūhu fa-akhadhahum `adhābu yawmiẓ ẓullah ۚ innahu kāna `adhāba yawmin `aẓīm

ayas.arabic: إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَـَٔايَةً ۖ وَمَا كَانَ أَكْثَرُهُم مُّؤْمِنِينَ
ayas.translation: Verily in that is a Sign: but most of them do not believe.
ayas.transliteration: inna fī dhālika la-āyah ۖ wa mā kāna aktharuhum mu-minīn

ayas.translation: And verily thy Lord is He, the Exalted in Might, Most Merciful.
Verily this is a Revelation from the Lord of the Worlds:
With it came down the spirit of Faith and Truth-
To thy heart and mind, that thou mayest admonish.
In the perspicuous Arabic tongue.
Without doubt it is (announced) in the mystic Books of former peoples.

ayas.arabic: أَوَلَمْ يَكُن لَّهُمْ ءَايَةً أَن يَعْلَمَهُۥ عُلَمَـٰٓؤُا۟ بَنِىٓ إِسْرَٰٓءِيلَ
ayas.translation: Is it not a Sign to them that the Learned of the Children of Israel knew it (as true)?
ayas.transliteration: awalam yakun lahum āyatan an ya`lamahu `ulamā-u banī isrā-iyl

ayas.translation: Had We revealed it to any of the non-Arabs,

ayas.arabic: فَقَرَأَهُۥ عَلَيْهِم مَّا كَانُوا۟ بِهِۦ مُؤْمِنِينَ
ayas.translation: And had he recited it to them, they would not have believed in it.
Thus have We caused it to enter the hearts of the sinners.

ayas.arabic: لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ بِهِۦ حَتَّىٰ يَرَوُا۟ ٱلْعَذَابَ ٱلْأَلِيمَ
ayas.translation: They will not believe in it until they see the grievous Penalty;
But the (Penalty) will come to them of a sudden, while they perceive it not;
Then they will say: "Shall we be respited?"
Do they then ask for Our Penalty to be hastened on?
Seest thou? If We do let them enjoy (this life) for a few years,
Yet there comes to them at length the (Punishment) which they were promised!

ayas.arabic: مَآ أَغْنَىٰ عَنْهُم مَّا كَانُوا۟ يُمَتَّعُونَ
ayas.translation: It will profit them not that they enjoyed (this life)!

ayas.arabic: وَمَآ أَهْلَكْنَا مِن قَرْيَةٍ إِلَّا لَهَا مُنذِرُونَ
ayas.translation: Never did We destroy a population, but had its warners -
ayas.transliteration: wa mā ahlaknā min qaryatin illā lahā mundhirūn

ayas.translation: By way of reminder; and We never are unjust.
No evil ones have brought down this (Revelation):
It would neither suit them nor would they be able (to produce it).
ayas.transliteration: wa mā yanbaghī lahum wa mā yastaṭī`ūn

ayas.translation: Indeed they have been removed far from even (a chance of) hearing it.

ayas.arabic: فَلَا تَدْعُ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَـٰهًا ءَاخَرَ فَتَكُونَ مِنَ ٱلْمُعَذَّبِينَ
ayas.translation: So call not on any other god with Allah, or thou wilt be among those under the Penalty.
ayas.transliteration: falā tad`u ma`allāhi ilāhan ākhara fatakūna minal mu`adhhabīn

ayas.translation: And admonish thy nearest kinsmen,

ayas.arabic: وَٱخْفِضْ جَنَاحَكَ لِمَنِ ٱتَّبَعَكَ مِنَ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
ayas.translation: And lower thy wing to the Believers who follow thee.

ayas.arabic: فَإِنْ عَصَوْكَ فَقُلْ إِنِّى بَرِىٓءٌ مِّمَّا تَعْمَلُونَ
ayas.translation: Then if they disobey thee, say: "I am free (of responsibility) for what ye do!"
ayas.transliteration: fa-in `aṣawka faqul innī barī-un mimmā ta`malūn

ayas.translation: And put thy trust on the Exalted in Might, the Merciful,-
Who seeth thee standing forth (in prayer),
And thy movements among those who prostrate themselves,
For it is He Who heareth and knoweth all things.

ayas.arabic: هَلْ أُنَبِّئُكُمْ عَلَىٰ مَن تَنَزَّلُ ٱلشَّيَـٰطِينُ
ayas.translation: Shall I inform you, (O people!), on whom it is that the evil ones descend?
They descend on every lying, wicked person,
(Into whose ears) they pour hearsay vanities, and most of them are liars.
And the Poets,- It is those straying in Evil, who follow them:

ayas.arabic: أَلَمْ تَرَ أَنَّهُمْ فِى كُلِّ وَادٍ يَهِيمُونَ
ayas.translation: Seest thou not that they wander distracted in every valley?-
ayas.transliteration: alam tara annahum fī kulli wādiy yahīmūn

ayas.translation: And that they say what they practise not?-

ayas.arabic: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ وَذَكَرُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ كَثِيرًا وَٱنتَصَرُوا۟ مِنۢ بَعْدِ مَا ظُلِمُوا۟ ۗ وَسَيَعْلَمُ ٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوٓا۟ أَىَّ مُنقَلَبٍ يَنقَلِبُونَ
ayas.translation: Except those who believe, work righteousness, engage much in the remembrance of Allah, and defend themselves only after they are unjustly attacked. And soon will the unjust assailants know what vicissitudes their affairs will take!
ayas.transliteration: illal ladhīna āmanū wa`amiluṣ ṣāliḥāti wadhakarullāha kathīran wantaṣarū min ba`di mā ẓulimū ۗ wasaya`lamul ladhīna ẓalamū ayya munqalabiy yanqalibūn
